channel.title: Changing weapon hits
channel.description: I need to know where to look to edit how accurate and how high something hits other than messing with bonuses. I am using delta source and as we all know specs fail on it. I was just wondering what i had to change to update them.

item.title: Changing weapon hits
item.dc:creator: @grimreaper61 grimreaper61
item.description:
@grimreaper61 wrote:

i threw caution to the wind and it is for hit percentage, worked perfect. thank you both for the help

Read full topic

item.title: Changing weapon hits
item.dc:creator: @1337_owns 1337 owns
item.description:
@1337_owns wrote:

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 35 && specialAmount > 49){ setAnimation(2890); specialAmount -= 50; hitDiff = misc.random(playerMaxHit + 10); getHit(45); specOn = false; lastSpecial = System.currentTimeMillis(); specGFX(655); }

Read full topic

wait your talking about individual weapons? idk i think the server randomizes everything about a weaponâ€™s accuracy and highness of its hit the only thing i can tell you is you need to change the bonus in item.cfg

item.title: Changing weapon hits
item.dc:creator: @pureatt_90 pureatt 90
item.description:
@pureatt_90 wrote:

i think you go to client.java and change the numbers before hitDiff (search exprate (double) or something like that and yes you have to use the parenthesis before and after double)
